description: Format used to define main mod file (mod.json) in VCMI
title: VCMI mod file format

___conflicts.description: List of mods that can't be enabled in the same time as this one

___filesystem.description: Optional, description on how files are organized in your mod. In most cases you do not need to use this field

additionalProperties.description: list of data sources attached to this mount point

___heroes.description: List of configuration files for heroes

___creatures.description: List of configuration files for creatures

___artifacts.description: List of configuration files for artifacts

___factions.description: List of configuration files for towns/factions

___modType.description: Type of mod, e.g. Town, Artifacts, Graphical.

___contact.description: Home page of mod or link to forum thread

___name.description: Short name of your mod. No more than 2-3 words

___depends.description: List of mods that are required to run this one

___spells.description: List of configuration files for spells

___description.description: More lengthy description of mod. No hard limit

___version.description: Current mod version, up to 3 numbers, dot-separated. Format: A.B.C

___author.description: Author of the mod. Can be nickname, real name or name of team

___heroClasses.description: List of configuration files for hero classes
